setup:
1. Install Python from python.org
2. Create a virtual environment
3. Activate and install requirements
deployment:
1. Git init
2. Commit changes
3. Push to GitHub
4. Set up GitHub Actions
debugging:
1. Enable logging
2. Check error message
3. Search docs
4. Use debugger
optimization:
1. Profile code
2. Use efficient structures
3. Cache/memoize
4. Parallelize
contributing:
1. Fork repo
2. Create feature branch
3. Commit changes
4. Open PR
